actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Burdick with amendments and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 101-280.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 534.
Passed Senate with amendments and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.
Senate passed companion measure H.R. 3961 in lieu of this measure by Voice Vote.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: An Act to designate the United States courthouse located at 1800 Fifth Avenue North in Birmingham, Alabama, as the "Robert Smith Vance Federal Office Building and United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse in Birmingham, Alabama, as the Robert Smith Vance Federal Office Building and United States Courthouse.

titles.title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse located at 1800 Fifth Avenue North in Birmingham, Alabama as the "Robert Smith Vance United States Courthouse".
An Act to designate the United States courthouse located at 1800 Fifth Avenue North in Birmingham, Alabama, as the "Robert Smith Vance Federal Office Building and United States Courthouse".
